CustomField.description: Returns true if we're in the Active window (or the active window is blank)
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( ISBLANK( Valid_From_Date__c ) ,Valid_From_Date__c<= TODAY()) , OR( ISBLANK( Valid_To_Date__c ) ,Valid_To_Date__c>=TODAY()) ) , true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For a bundle to be active, either leave the valid dates blank, or make sure that today is within the active window. To inactivate a bundle, enter a Valid To date that is before today.
CustomField.label: Active
